oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ladies Group
جماعة السيدات
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bint Al Nil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article features the different activities of the Ladies Group, a modest independent philanthropy institute located in the busy suburb of Sayyida Zainab, Cairo. The Group aims at the promotion of women ethically, religiously and socially in all possible ways. The Ladies Group runs two houses: the Women’s Foster Care House and the Orphan Foster Care House.

تتحدث هذه المقالة عن "جماعة السيدات" وهي دار متواضعة مستقلة في حي السيدة زينب، تهدف إلى النهوض بالمرأة خلقيًّا ودينيًّا واجتماعيًّا بمختلف الوسائل المشروعة. وتشرف الجماعة على "دار كفالة المرأة" و"دار كفالة اليتيمات".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; The American University in Cairo
